org.openhab.binding.adorne.internal

Class AdorneSwitchHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler
      • org.openhab.binding.adorne.internal.AdorneSwitchHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.ThingHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdorneDimmerHandler

    public class AdorneSwitchHandler
extends org.eclipse.smarthome.core.thing.binding.BaseThingHandler
    The AdorneSwitchHandler is responsible for handling commands, which are sent to one of the channels.
    Author:
    Mark Theiding - Initial contribution
